thread.title: Deal of the Week: Microsoft Office Productivity Bundle (Pay What You Want)
thread.title_full: Deal of the Week: Microsoft Office Productivity Bundle (Pay What You Want)

author: Martin Brinkmann
title: Deal of the Week: Microsoft Office Productivity Bundle (Pay What You Want)
text: Click here to open the Microsoft Office Productivity Bundle offer on Ghacks Deals You find additional information about each course on the page, for instance how many lectures it includes, for how long it runs (usually several hours of video content) and the topics it covers. The courses are designed for Office 2013 but most of what you learn in them can be applied to Office 2016 and to a degree older versions of Office as well. Make sure you check out other software, e-learning or gadget deals on Ghacks Deals . Please share this article About Martin Brinkmann Martin Brinkmann is a journalist from Germany who founded Ghacks Technology News Back in 2005. He is passionate about all things tech and knows the Internet and computers like the back of his hand. You can follow Martin on Facebook , Twitter or Google+
